lead_paragraph: The judge who was called a “hater” by Donald J. Trump has ruled against the presumptive Republican nominee in a lawsuit related to his real estate school.

headline.print_headline: Judge Called ‘Hater’ by Trump Orders School Papers Unsealed
headline.main: Judge Orders Documents Unsealed in Trump University Lawsuit

snippet: The judge who was called a “hater” by Donald J. Trump has ruled against the presumptive Republican nominee in a lawsuit related to his real estate school.
abstract: Judge Gonzalo P Curiel of United States District Court signs order to unseal documents related to lawsuit filed against Donald J Trump's defunct real estate school Trump University; move comes after Trump makes derogatory comments about Judge Curiel at political rally.
